– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision

1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure sign size and immage correspond with contract drawings and meets specification
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Check for any services in proximity to points of installation or coring for spigots
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Set out work in accordance with drawings and in accordance with alignments, levels, grades, and sections.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The required positions of all posts and signs shall be as directed by the Superintendent who shall confirm the positions before the erection of posts commences.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Sign to be installed as per most current drawings, local council documentation, and to the correct height and position.
○ Spigot embedment shall be within +/- 5mm of design horizontal position and +10mm of vertical design position
○ Signs specified to be re used are to comply with AS 1742 standards, and must be replaced if deemed in unsatisfactory condition
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off

ITP-036 - Kerb Access Ramp Bluestone Footpath
template name: ITP-036 - Kerb Access Ramp Bluestone Footpath

name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that employees and sub-contractors are using the most current and complete set of drawings
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Contract Drawings and Registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, including: EMP, TMP, SWMS and WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: EMP, TMP, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Care shall be taken in removing existing bluestone kerb
○ Detailed dilapidation survey shall be conducted, noting the size and quantity of pitchers before demolition of heritage bluestone
○ Bluestone shall be salvaged and re-used in new kerb alignment where possible
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Inspect delivered materials for any chips, cracks or other visible damage.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Line and level of reinstated bluestone kerbing shall be set out according to design levels.
○ Line and level of bluestone pavers, tactiles and inlay shall be set out according to design levels to suit new kerb heights.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
Construction of Access Ramp Bluestone Footpath
2.1 Re-levelling of bluestone kerbing and ramp
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bluestone kerbing to be re-installed to new design levels.
○ Bluestone kerb shall be placed on a bed of low slump, 20 Mpa concrete of 75mm minimum thickness.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: IFC Drawings, CoM Bluestone Paving Specification
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete base shall be inspected to be free of foreign materials and water pooling
○ After placing and vibration, the concrete shall be screeded and trowelled to the correct level.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: CoM Bluestone Paving Specification
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Mortar shall be applied at average thickness of 30mm to concrete base
○ All pavers shall be coated in mortar slurry on rear face before laying
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pavers shall be cut with a diamond blade and allow a 10mm grout line at such points
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pavers shall be placed in accordance with Dwg 1P50402.
○ Kerb access ramp wings shall be at an angle of 45° and the ramp gradient shall not exceed 1:8.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pavers shall have >24hrs curing time prior to light traffic
○ Where required, ply shall be laid over area of works
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pavers shall be grouted using agreed colour and mixture
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
2.9 Installation of Versatac Granite Tactiles and Granite Inlay
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Tactiles and inlay shall be placed in accordance with Standard Drawing 1P50201.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pavement area is free of debris and waste
○ Bluestone pavement is free of mortar stains and cleaned to satisfaction
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
